mapper.select: SELECT tab_track_details.id, tab_track_details.track_no trackNo, tab_track_details.action_date actionDate, tab_track_details.action_info actionInfo, tab_track_details.action_info_cn actionInfoCn, tab_track_details.flag FROM cross_border_shop.tab_track_details WHERE tab_track_details.track_no = #{trackNo} ORDER BY tab_track_details.action_date DESC
